mapper.select: SELECT li.emp_no empNo , fo.access_level accessLevel , fo.emp_state empState , fo.emp_name empName , fo.employ_date employDate , fo.dept_name deptName FROM emp_no_list li INNER JOIN emp_info fo ON li.emp_no = fo.emp_no INNER JOIN member_info mem ON fo.emp_no = mem.emp_no WHERE li.emp_no = #{memberId} AND mem.pw = PASSWORD( #{memberPw} );
